title: [K-12] Short-term Professional Development Course for Elementary Teachers Using Video Coaching

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Instructional Skills and Social Studies Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on situational reflective practice using video coaching tools accessible via smartphones

learning_goals: Analyze verbal/non-verbal interactions in instructional videos to derive ≥3 context-specific teaching strategies
Incorporate ≥2 improved lesson plans reflecting student engagement strategies based on peer feedback and coaching
Video-analyze conflict cases from social studies classes and propose ≥1 alternative strategy through reflective journaling

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
